headline: Apollo vs. KKR & Co.: Which Asset Manager Offers Better Upside Now?
summary: Does APO's diversified growth, rising AUM and recent deals help it stand out over KKR as the asset manager offering greater upside? Let us find out.

headline: European markets end lower; ad group WPP rose 11% as private equity firms circle
summary: European stocks were lower on Monday, erasing gains in early trade.
